features: Indulge skin daily using all the best parts of the coconut and exotic Acacia Senegal; The luxurious blend of 100 percent Virgin Coconut Oil, Coconut Milk and Coconut Water moisturize and soften; Provides everyday hydration for all skin types

Organic Raw Shea Butter: Deeply moisturizes with vitamins and essential fatty acids; Coconut Oil & Coconut Milk Blend: Conditioning properties smooth and soften skin; Acacia Senegal: Seals in moisture
Smooth lotion all over your skin after bath or shower, or use as a massage cream
Made with Fair Trade Shea Butter
No Sulfates, No Parabens, No Phthalates, No Propylene Glycol, No Mineral Oil, No Animal Testing, No Petroleum
body.description: Description & Usage: Indulge skin daily using all the best parts of the coconut and exotic Acacia Senegal. The luxurious blend of 100% Virgin Coconut Oil, Coconut Milk and Coconut Water moisturize and soften. Provides everyday hydration for all skin types. Smooth lotion all over your skin after bath or shower, or use as a massage cream. Our Story: Sofi Tucker started selling Shea Nuts at the village market in Bonthe, Sierra Leone in 1912. By age 19, the widowed mother of four was selling Shea Butter, African Black Soap and her homemade hair and skin preparations all over the countryside. Sofi Tucker was our Grandmother and SheaMoisture is her legacy. With this purchase you help empower disadvantaged women to realize a brighter, healthier future. Ethically Traded Ingredients Sustainably Produced. Pioneering Community Commerce and Fair Trade Since 1912. Tested on the Tucker family for four generations. Never on animals.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Features and Benefits Moisturizes, Soothes, and Softens SheaMoisture body lotion moisturizes and nourishes skin keeping it soft and supple, while helping to calm and soothe dry, irritated skin and helps protect against damage from pollutants. It leaves you with an oil-free, healthy glow. Natural Ingredients This organic lotion is loaded with organic raw Shea butter and 100% pure virgin coconut oil. Together, they keep your skin nourished, hydrated, and protected. Natural ingredients such as Acacia Senegal helps to heal, repair, and soothe damaged, irritated skin. Certifications Our products are natural, sustainably-produced, and made with love for you and your body. We pioneer fair trade through Community Commerce at home, and abroad. We strive to be sulfate and paraben free, and more, whenever possible. We have tested our soaps on our family for generations, never on animals. Certified as the B Corporation by B Lab, issue date 9/23/2018

SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Cleansing Balm SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Instant Hydration Gel Mask SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Ground Coffee Scrub w/ coconut Milk Use for it Removing makeup Hydrating skin on your face Exfoliating dull, dry skin Ingredients 100% Virgin Coconut Oil and Acacia Senegal 100% Virgin Coconut Oil, Organic Shea Butter, and Vitamin E 100% Virgin Coconut Oil, Ground Coffee & Organic Raw Shea Butter Result Hydrates skin and locks in moisture leaving it nourished, cleansed and soft The biodegradable bio cellulose gel mask naturally contours to your face and drenches skin with instant hydration Gently exfoliates dull, dry skin to smooth and soften even the roughest patches

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great skin moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: This is the best overall moisturizer we have found. Faint pleasant scent ( NO fragrance). Not watery. Keeps skin moist until next day’s shower. BUT, as others have said, it’s too thick for a plunge dispenser. We immediately transferred it to two low jars for easy use. A bit messy, but SO worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lotion is awesome pump can be primed but it’s worth keeping
reviews.reviewText: Excellent product. The lotion at first gets stuck in the pump. I’ve been using this product for years. It’s thick, which makes it a great moisturizer. It’s also why the pump gets stuck at first. Take it apart and run hot water and a pipe cleaner through it. It will work fine after that. It’s worth keeping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Best lotion I've ever found
reviews.reviewText: Lovely light scent, not overwhelming. The coconut lotion moisturizes beautifully without being greasy or sticky ever. Truly the best lotion I've ever found. But... it is almost impossible to get out of the container. It is too thick to use from the plastic bottle that is difficult to squeeze (not meant to.) How best to get it out???

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product but crap dispenser
reviews.reviewText: The lotion is really thick and lovely, but as it’s so thick, the pump does not work and it’s very hard to try and squeeze out of the container. It really needs to be in a different container. It smells beautiful and is deeply moisturising.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great lotion, horrible container
reviews.reviewText: I love this lotion, but the last three containers that I have had, the pumps do not work. It is really hard to get the lotion out of the container. It is very thick which is nice, but it would be nice if it would actually come out with the pump. Very frustrating. I will not buy this lotion anymore unless they fix the pump or put it in a different container is easier to access. I gave it three stars because of the container which makes it very frustrating. Like I said, the lotion is awesome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, pure ingredients
reviews.reviewText: I love this product for overall moisturizing. Lately, my face has gotten dryer and I even put it on my face because it is gentle. Doesn’t leave any film and it really makes a difference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just change the container. It’s worth it
reviews.reviewText: I put this lotion in a wide screw top container. This lotion smells so good and feels great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the lotion but it's too thick
reviews.reviewText: The lotion works great at moisturizing, and the scent is very pleasant. The sole issue is how thick it is. The pump stopped working after a while and we have to open the top and use the straw to wipe lotion on our hands. This would be better packaged in a jar.
Huele excelente e hidrata muy bien la piel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 20, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I find this has a funny odour? Is this normal or can this stuff go off and turn???

reviews.reviewTitle: Crema ligera y con delicioso olor
reviews.reviewText: Me encantó la consistencia, el olor, el color y la presentación. Es una crema ligera, perfecta para pieles grasas. Puede ser complementada con algún serum. Mi piel es bastante grasa con tendencia a seca en los extremos del rostro y ha humectado todo muy bien ;)

reviews.reviewTitle: Bottle does not come with the nozzle as advertised
reviews.reviewText: The site shows a bottle with nozzle but the ones delivered to me do not. This cap is not suitable for the lotion as it is not easy to squeeze out the lotion with this kind of cap.
